name: GNU dot org - darker and bluer
description: An edit of GNU dot org - dark.
additional_info: An edit of GNU dot org - dark. This makes some sections darker and uses a blue color instead of red. Change Log (started on July 24, 2018): July 24, 2018: - run on the domain 'gnu.org', instead of using a regexp - covered pre.smallexample class (used on gcc.gnu.org)
